units.title: Feeder‑free hES/iPS cell culture and BFP measurement
units.text: Feeder-free hES cells or iPS cells were cultured on hES cell-qualified ally. BFP fluorescence was measured at 7, 14 and 20 days postinfection.
units.rationale: Provides culture conditions and the time points for fluorescence readout.
